features: [Small Area, Large Capacity] This SONGMICS tall shoe rack has the perfect compact size for a small space. At just 1.47 sq. ft, it can hold 16-24 pairs of shoes, and even can be as a storage shelf for bags and toys

[Adjustable & Stackable Shoe Rack] Add 2 sets of our 8-tier shoe rack towers to split and stack vertically for a complete 10-tier shoe rack and 6-tier shoe rack, with 4 adjustable feet can add higher additional bottom storage for more shoes, maximizing your space and creating more storage opportunities

[High-Quality Materials] The sturdy shoe organizer is made of thickened powder-coated steel and dense wire that is corrosion and rust-resistant. This skinny shoe rack holds 30 lbs per shelf, ensuring your shoes have enough high stability for easy organization and storage

[Multifunctional Storage Rack Shelf] Our tall shoe holder shelf can fit in many corners, as an entry shoe rack or closet shoe rack, bedroom shoe rack or front door shoe rack, or even as a bathroom shelf, plant shelf, pantry shelf, or kitchen storage rack

[Easy to Assemble Shoe Shelf] It comes with everything you need to assemble, like easy-to-read directions and labeled pieces, and will take just minutes by hand to build this free-standing shoe rack. It also comes with 2 anti-tip kits to attach the product to the wall for safer use

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SONGMICS 8 Tier Tall Shoe Rack Storage Organizer, Metal Narrow Shoe Rack Storage Shelf Unit, Sturdy Large Closet Shoe Shelf Organizer for 16-24 Pairs Combining Style and Practicality: Stop tucking your shoe collection into a shabby cabinet or just piling them up on the ground—they deserve our durable metal shoe stand that holds your shoes in an accessible, visible manner while maintaining a good shape.

Why Choose This Tall Shoe Rack? With a compact size of 12"D x 17.6"W x 50.6"H, this 8-tier shoe rack offers more storage space while taking up little floor space.Metal shelves with reinforced ribs provide extra strength to its overall structure.This unit also fits into the living room as a storage rack, garage for an out-of-season shoe collection, or even a corner that would otherwise be useless.Screw-in leveling feet enhance stability while protecting your floors from scratches.The anti-tip kit included adds extra safety for your family.

Fixed by Screws Each tier is fixed by screws, adding strength and stability to its overall structure. Solid Metal Shelves Each shelf can hold up to 30 lb. 4 Adjustable Feet Enhances the stability when using it on uneven floors.

Specifications: Color: BronzeMaterial: SteelProduct Size: 12"D x 17.6"W x 50.6"H (30.5 x 44.6 x 128.5 cm)Net Weight: 7.9 lb (3.6 kg)Max. Static Load Capacity of Each Shelf: 30 lb (13.6 kg) Package Contents: 1 x Shoe Rack2 x Anti-Tip Kit1 x Instructions SONGMICS Notes: For safety, please install the anti-tipping kit to the wall.All load capacities mentioned refer to the static load capacity. Do not exceed the max. load capacity of 30 lb per tier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble, sturdy because its all metal, and fits nice in a small space. One drawback is that it’s not suitable for big size shoes or boots

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was concerned after reading some of the other reviews but I found that this simple to assemble, sturdy, attractive, and functional.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Holds a lot of shoes
reviews.reviewText: This shoe rack holds a lot of shoes and allowed me to take advantage of the vertical space I have it in rather than the wide shoe rack I had before. Not great for large boots, barely wide enough for 2 Mens size 12 boots but everything else fits great. It was pretty easy to set up and looks great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to build and looks perfect in my closet
reviews.reviewText: Everything is exactly as described. The measurements the sturdiness and the ease of the directions. I had it together in 25 minutes. Im a size 8 shoe and two pairs of my shoes fit on a rack. Im a minimalist. I didnt buy it to jam all my shoes on there. I used it for function and as a display as well. I love it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All that it claims
reviews.reviewText: This was very easy to put together. As a person with very limited space (and an almost unhealthy obsession with shoes) I think this item is perfect! It fit in my closet and is already full. No signs of dipping on the shelves, and pretty sturdy for its purpose. Never tested weight capacity, but I imagine it’d be pretty great for plants or storage too.I’d absolutely recommend this product to others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Parts were bagged and labeled. Diagram was clear! Very pleased with the care it was packaged. Seems to be very sturdy. Tip over strap included!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: this is nice but very small. the dims are given and are accurate but reading numbers and seeing in person are different. it is very light weight, so light you can carry with ease. looks more like a shelf with small spaces between. the rack spaces are the height of a shoe box and just wide enough for 2 shoe boxes. only recommend for light shoes/sandals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy but mismanufactured
reviews.reviewText: Well packaged, no missing parts, convenient allen wrench for assembly, simple straightforward assembly. So why only 3 stars ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️? One of the adjustable feet (really just a bolt with a plastic head) wouldn’t screw into the nut welded into the bottom of one leg, rendering the stand unadjustable. I’m keeping it, but I’ll have to make a little platform for under that leg. The nut that the adjustment screw is supposed to fit seems internally damaged.
Excelente para los zapatos o espacios pequeños

Rack was easy to assemble. It is very sturdy and the perfect size for my front closet. The height is adjustable if you forgo a few levels of the rack, as the height of the rack comes in sections which you can opt in or opt out of using when constructing. It is easy to disassemble to store or move. I am very satisfied with this rack and wish I purchased it sooner. I am happy to replace my previous mesh hanger that was attached to the wire rack with this metal rack to hold all of my every-day shoes and tote bags. One of the best utility purchases I have made on this site, by far. Although I was not very keen on the bronze colour, I can definitely say this rack will come with me as I upgrade my lifestyle in the future. 10/10 product and will be recommending it to my friends and family as they need.
Really good takes less space accommodates enough shoes also stable and sturdy .
Llegó abollado de una sección. Tuve que hacerlo entrar a la fuerza. No sé dónde los guardan pero deberían verificar que estén bien antes de enviarlos. : (
It's easy to assemble. The paint and coating peel off easily.
